name: CHHapticAdvancedPatternPlayer
desc: A protocol that defines an advanced pattern player capable of looping, seeking, pausing, and resuming haptic playback.

items.name: var loopEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that determines whether the haptic repeats itself on completion.

items.name: var loopEnd: TimeInterval
items.desc: The time at which to end looping haptic playback.

items.name: var playbackRate: Float
items.desc: The playback rate of the haptic player.

items.name: var completionHandler: CHHapticAdvancedPatternPlayerCompletionHandler
items.desc: A completion block that runs after the haptic finishes playing.

items.name: typealias CHHapticAdvancedPatternPlayerCompletionHandler
items.desc: A typealias for the completion handler to run after a haptic finishes playback.

items.name: func pause(atTime: TimeInterval)
items.desc: Pauses the haptic player during playback.

items.name: func seek(toOffset: TimeInterval)
items.desc: Jumps to the specified offset time in playing the haptic.

items.name: var isMuted: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that silences all haptic and audio output from the player when set to true.
